text.div:
Generated Narrative with Details

id: questionnaireresponse-example-dast

identifier: DAST-example

questionnaire: http://fhir.org/guides/argonaut-questionnaire/Questionnaire/questionnaire-example-dast

status: completed

subject: subject

authored: May 29, 2018

author: subject

source: subject

item

linkId: d2

text: Have you used drugs other than those required for medical reasons?

Answers

-Value[x]
*Yes

item

linkId: d3

text: Do you abuse more than one drug at a time?

Answers

-Value[x]
*Yes

item

linkId: d4

text: Are you unable to stop abusing drugs when you want to?

Answers

-Value[x]
*Yes

item

linkId: d5

text: Have you ever had blackouts or flashbacks as a result of drug use?

Answers

-Value[x]
*Yes

item

linkId: d6

text: Do you ever feel bad or guilty about your drug use?

Answers

-Value[x]
*Yes

item

linkId: d7

text: Does your spouse (or parents) ever complain about your involvement with drugs?

Answers

-Value[x]
*Yes

item

linkId: d8

text: Have you neglected your family because of your use of drugs?

Answers

-Value[x]
*Yes

item

linkId: d9

text: Have you engaged in illegal activities in order to obtain drugs?

Answers

-Value[x]
*Yes

item

linkId: d10

text: Have you ever experienced withdrawal symptoms (felt sick) when you stopped taking drugs?

Answers

-Value[x]
*Yes

item

linkId: d11

text: Have you had medical problems as a result of your drug use (e.g. memory loss, hepatitis, convulsions, bleeding)?

Answers

-Value[x]
*Yes

item.text: Have you used drugs other than those required for medical reasons?
Do you abuse more than one drug at a time?
Are you unable to stop abusing drugs when you want to?
Have you ever had blackouts or flashbacks as a result of drug use?
Do you ever feel bad or guilty about your drug use?
Does your spouse (or parents) ever complain about your involvement with drugs?
Have you neglected your family because of your use of drugs?
Have you engaged in illegal activities in order to obtain drugs?
Have you ever experienced withdrawal symptoms (felt sick) when you stopped taking drugs?
Have you had medical problems as a result of your drug use (e.g. memory loss, hepatitis, convulsions, bleeding)?
